scene.name: start
scene.description:
******************************************* ***** The Mansion of Professor Ludlow ***** ******************************************* Adapted from a D&D module by James Ward
You are on a camping trip with a large group of boyscouts. During a nighttime hike, you get separated from the rest of the group. You stumble upon a meadow. There in front of you is a large mansion. You hear an eary plea for help coming from inside. What do you do?

choice.description: Knock on the front door
Open the front door without knocking

scene.name: no_response
scene.description: No one comes to the door and you hear nothing. A few minutes pass. Still nothing.

choice.description: Knock again
Open the front door without knocking
Return to the rest of your group

scene.name: inside_entrance
scene.description: The double door is unlocked and opens easily. The beam of your flashligh reveals an empty hallway with a mirror at the opposite end. There are openings that lead to rooms on the right and left. The hall has inch-thick red carpeting and walnut-paneled walls. The mirror at the end runs from the floor to the twenty-foot-high ceiling and covers the forty feet of wall section on that south face of the hall.

choice.description: Go through left opening
Go through right opening
Tamper with mirror at the end of the hall.
Exit the mansion

scene.name: rat_room
scene.description: There are leaves on the floor, and an old worn out couch in the north east corner. There is a musty smell to the room, and leaves are littered on the floor. The couch is an old, dusty, overstuffed relic with several cushions and rips on all parts of it. The room measures sixty feet east and west and forty feet north and south, if paced out. There is a door on the east side of the room.

choice.description: Inspect the couch.
Sift through the leaves on the floor.
Go through the door on the east side.
Go back to the inside entrance

scene.name: rat_attack
scene.description: Rats com out from under the couch and attack you. One bites you and gives you a terrible disease. (Suggestion: maybe we should have generated melee combat here so the outcome is random.)

scene.name: key
scene.description: You find a golden key under the pile of leaves. (Suggestion: keep an inventory of items that the player has.)

scene.name: pink_hallway
scene.description: The beam of your flashlight show a hall with pink walls and a floor of red marble. The walls have clean squares all over them where pictures were obviously once hung, but are no longer. The floor has dried leaves littering it. If paced out, the hall is eighty feet long east and west and twenty feet long north and south. The hall leads to another room at the end.

choice.description: Proceed into the room at the end of the hall.
Back to previous room

scene.name: crate_room
scene.description: The beam of the flashlight shows a room with gray painted walls and a cement floor. It is filled with wooden crates and there are leaves all over the room in large piles. There are 200 empty wooden crates of differing sizes, and the biggest concentration of leaves is in the southwest corner of the room. The room measures sixty feet east and west and forty feet north and south and has a side alcove to the south starting on the east wall that is forty feet long east and west and twenty feet long north and south. It is here that the concentration of leaves is located. Behind a big crate along the east wall, thirty feet from the north corner, one finds a door with a normal handle.

choice.description: Go through door behind big crate.
Look inside all the crates.
Sift through the pile of leaves on the floor.
Proceed into the room at the end of the hall.
Back to hallway

scene.name: open_crates
scene.description: It takes you a really long time, but you finally open and inspect all the crates." + You find nothing in them except for leaves, dust, and 200 paperclips. ",

scene.name: crate_room_leaves
scene.description: There are snakes in the leaves. A group of 3 4 foot long rattlesnakes attack. (HP: 10,8,5; #AT: 1; damage:1-3; AC: 5; SA: Save versus death caused by poison).

scene.name: E

choice.description: Proceed into the room at the end of the hall.

scene.name: mirror
scene.description: You find that the mirror lifts easily. There is a secrete door behind it.

choice.description: Try to open the secret door.

scene.name: gold
scene.description: Congratulations. There is a pot of gold behind the door. You go home rich.

scene.name: boogie
scene.description: The boogie man jumps out and eats you.

scene.name: quit
scene.description: You go back to the others. They don't believe your story. You enjoy the rest of the camping trip.

choice.description: Return to the mansion
